description: A pun on the risk of stealing kitchenware.
title: Whisk Taker
n_1: Chef Benny contemplates stealing a mixer from work.
c1_1: I need this mixer at home.
n_2: Sous Sally questions the morality of Benny's decision.
c2_2: But what if you get caught?
c1_3: I'll return it before anyone notices.
n_4: Sally realizes the pun, and they both chuckle.
c1_4: Exactly, a whisk I'm willing to take!
c2_4: Hope it doesn’t stir up trouble!
